class.rdfs:comment: An entry point, within some Web-based protocol.
class.rdfs:label: EntryPoint

schema:actionApplication.rdfs:comment: An application that can complete the request.
schema:actionApplication.rdfs:label: actionApplication

schema:actionPlatform.rdfs:comment: The high level platform(s) where the Action can be performed for the given URL. To specify a specific application or operating system instance, use actionApplication.
schema:actionPlatform.rdfs:label: actionPlatform

schema:application.rdfs:comment: An application that can complete the request.
schema:application.rdfs:label: application

schema:contentType.rdfs:comment: The supported content type(s) for an EntryPoint response.
schema:contentType.rdfs:label: contentType

schema:encodingType.rdfs:comment: The supported encoding type(s) for an EntryPoint request.
schema:encodingType.rdfs:label: encodingType

schema:httpMethod.rdfs:comment: An HTTP method that specifies the appropriate HTTP method for a request to an HTTP EntryPoint. Values are capitalized strings as used in HTTP.
schema:httpMethod.rdfs:label: httpMethod

schema:urlTemplate.rdfs:comment: An url template (RFC6570) that will be used to construct the target of the execution of the action.
schema:urlTemplate.rdfs:label: urlTemplate
